15 //template class for simple functions (breifs in horiz_drive.cpp)
16 template <class T>
17 void constrain(T &value, T min, T max){
18  if(value > max){
19  value = max;
20  } else if(value < min){
21  value = min;
22  }
23 }
24 
25 template <class T>
26 T abs(T value){
27  if(value < 0)
28  value*=-1;
29  return value;
30 }
31 
32 template <class T>
33 T max(T value1, T value2){
34  if(value1 > value2)
35  return value1;
36  return value2;
37 }
38 
39 template <class T>
40 T min(T value1, T value2){
41  if(value1 < value2)
42  return value1;
43  return value2;
44 }
45 
46 template <class T>
47 T map(T input, T inMin, T inMax, T outMin, T outMax){
48  T output = (input - inMin) * (outMax - outMin) / (inMax - inMin) + outMin;
49  return output;
50 }

57 void commandVectorCallback(const geometry_msgs::Twist::ConstPtr& vel)
58 {
59  //only deals with values pertaining to vertical "vector" drive
60  //vertical value
61  double linearZ = vel->linear.z;
62 
63  double T5 = linearZ*1000;
64  double T6 = linearZ*1000;
65  double T7 = linearZ*1000;
66  double T8 = linearZ*1000;
67 
68  thrustPercents.t1 = T5;
69  thrustPercents.t2 = T6;
70  thrustPercents.t3 = T7;
71  thrustPercents.t4 = T8;
72 
73  //publish message
74  pub.publish(thrustPercents);
75 }
76 
77 int main(int argc, char **argv)
78 {
79 
80  //initialize node for horizontal vector drive
81  ros::init(argc, argv, "vert_drive");
82 
83  ros::NodeHandle n;
84 
85  //ROS publisher to send thruster percent to hardware control node for CAN transmission
86  pub = n.advertise<vector_drive::thrusterPercents>("rov/cmd_vertical_vdrive", 1);
87 
88  //ROS subscriber to get vectors from the joystick control input
89  sub = n.subscribe("rov/cmd_vel", 1, commandVectorCallback);
90 
91 
92  ros::spin();
93 
94  return 0;
95 }
